data.title: Auburn Hills, MI homes for sale & real estate
data.meta_description: Search 49 homes for sale in Auburn Hills and book a home tour instantly with a Redfin agent. Updated every 5 minutes, get the latest on property info, market updates, and more.
data.text:
ABOUT THIS HOME

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Rarely available and highly sought after oversized pie-shaped lot backing to a picturesque wooded preserve in desirable Heritage In The Hills, a private 55+ active community with gated and guarded entrance. Enjoy the many available lifestyle amenities including heated saltwater pool, spa, pickleball, bocce ball, tennis, shuffleboard, bus trips, and festive social events at the beautiful clubhouse. Huge living room with soaring vaulted ceiling and an abundance of windows providing plenty of natural light. Expansive and private main level master bedroom suite features gorgeous wooded preserve views, luxurious spa-like bathroom with dual sink vanity, separate walk-in shower, relaxing soaking t

ABOUT THIS HOME

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Welcome home to this wonderful Auburn Hills Bi-Level with nice curb appeal. The lower-level features a comfortable living room with plenty of natural light. The breakfast nook and kitchen feature premium vinyl flooring, plenty of cabinets for storage, and lots of counterspace. The lower-level is complete with a powder room and laundry room with a new laundry tub. Upstairs you will find an oversized primary bedroom with plenty of room for an office/den or sitting area. The large full bathroom features double sinks. The two additional bedrooms complete the upper-level. The fully fenced back yard includes a patio for grilling and relaxing. Other features include a 2-car garage and central A/C.

ABOUT THIS HOME

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Discover the charm and convenience of this delightful, manufactured home nestled in the desirable Lake in the Hills in Auburn Hills. This newly listed residence boasts a fresh atmosphere with three bedrooms, including a serene primary bedroom with a primary bathroom. Spread across 1150 square feet, the layout ensures a cozy yet spacious environment perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests. Recently upgraded with a new air conditioner and accommodating three parking spots, this home is as practical as it is comfortable. Perfect for those who appreciate a blend of convenience and nature, this home is a warm invitation to balanced living. Ready to make your move? This could be the perfect s

ABOUT THIS HOME

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

This light-filled and freshly painted condo boasts a bright and airy atmosphere with neutral tones throughout. Enjoy the open feel provided by cathedral ceilings and new skylights, complemented by a roof replacement in 2022. The layout features two spacious bedrooms and two full bathrooms, with the front bedroom offering versatility as a cozy office or den. Beautiful wood floors grace the foyer, kitchen, breakfast nook, and laundry room. Step out from the breakfast nook onto your private deck and brick paver patio—ideal for morning coffee or evening gatherings. Convenient main-floor laundry includes a washer and dryer. The attached two-car garage features a ramp, which can be removed

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

New Construction built by Moceri ! Discover a ranch home with elegant simplicity and timeless style designed to live with an easy maintenance free lifestyle. An open concept main floor kitchen, dining and living room space appointed with incredible interior features. Main floor primary bedroom on-suite with large walk-in closet & spacious full bath featuring double sinks, linen closet and shower. Guest bedroom can be utilized as a home office or bedroom adjacent to full guest bathroom. Main floor laundry room. Lower level offers space for a future finished basement to provide a wonderful space for entertaining. Photos are of a similar property. Conveniently located near major freeways

This charming ranch home that offers the perfect blend of comfortable living and outdoor paradise in what feels like your own personal park. Welcome to your dream retreat with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and an array of fantastic features. Upon entering you'll be greeted by a large spacious living room that provides a warm and inviting atmosphere with hardwood floors and surrounded by extraordinary built in's that have bookcases and abundant storage. The kitchen and breakfast room shine with hardwood floors with ambient natural light. Be prepared to be wowed by the very spacious family room with a built in Murphy bed and banquet table. A versatile space that offers endless possibilities. This

Move In Ready! This meticulously maintained condo nestled in the heart of a vibrant 55+ community with walking trails in a private 4 acre nature preserve. Close to everything: Village of Rochester, Meadowbrook Theater, Oakland University, YMCA & Paint Creek Trail. An attractive and spacious condominium (only 5 years old) is loaded with builder extras; marble foyer, wide plank hardwood floors, contemporary granite countertops, kitchen features 42” cabinets with crown molding and roll out trays, bay window in primary bedroom, and direct vent gas fireplace. This condominium has an ideal floor plan; 2 bedroom, first floor primary suite, plus open loft area, 2 and ½ bath. Pr

Hawthorne Forest!! Absolutely stunning split level in turn-key condition. The original owner kept this home spotless, well maintained and updated. Award winning ROCHESTER SCHOOL DISTRICT with Musson Elementary, Van Hoosen Middle School and Adams High Schools a short drive or walk away. Hardwood floors greet you in the foyer and continue throughout the first floor. Neutral carpet in the Great Room with gorgeous stone gas fireplace for cozy nights. Spacious formal dining room and white cabinets, granite Countertops, and stainless appliances in the eat in kitchen with snack bar. Newer Bosch stainless fridge and dishwasher. Drink or wine fridge, kitchen doorwall overlooks one of the loveliest

RARE OPPORTUNITY! This 1910 farmhouse is full of charm but best of all it sits on 2.6 ACRES in the heart of Oakland County. Original hardwood flooring throughout entire home. Historic appeal with craftsman woodwork, solid wood doors and several built-ins upstairs. Quaint library with abundant natural light. FOUR bedrooms on second floor all with closets. Four season HEATED porch. Newer windows on main floor. First floor laundry hookup. Clawfoot tub in upstairs bath. Full basement with walkout access. Includes 36 x 40 POLE BARN with electric and poured concrete floor along with lean-to for extra storage. Perfect for hobbyist or tradesman. Property has wooded areas and a wildflower meadow wit

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Motivated Seller! Bring all offers. Cute little two bedroom home on a private setting. This property features, hardwood floors, updated furnace, updated hot water tank, updated roof, and a two car detached garage. The kitchen has been updated with new cabinets and all appliances are included. This property can possible be converted to commercial.

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Welcome to this charming ranch home, perfect for first-time buyers or those looking to expand their living space. Enjoy the cozy layout, full-grown garden bed for aspiring gardeners, and envision your future here. Recent upgrades include newer AC, countertops, gutters, dishwasher, range, washer, and fence. The windows, installed five years ago, come with a transferable warranty. Additionally, a one-year home warranty is included, offering peace of mind. Don't miss out on this delightful home with significant value and convenience for future homeowners!

Don't let this rare opportunity to live within walking distasnce to downtown Auburn Hills and Avondale Schools get away. This beautiful home has been painstakingly renovated inside and out. Striking refinished hardwood floors throughout most of the main floor. Top-of-the-line kitchen with granite tops. The basement is finished with laundry area, a full bath, furnace, AC, water heater 2021, New paint and carpet 2023, garage door 2022, garage floor painted 2021, roof 2016. 2 car att gar. Hurry don't miss out!

Equipped with loads of upgrades - this is one you truly won’t want to miss out on! Featuring a gourmet white kitchen with granite tops, soft-close cabinets and under cabinet lighting. Primary suite with stylish ensuite dual vanities, walk-in tile shower, and huge custom closet. Open concept living between kitchen, dining and living rooms with gleaming hardwood floors. Welcome home! This three bedroom, one and a half bath townhome has everything you need and want! It's move in ready with hardwood floors throughout and in the perfect location- so close to Oakland University, Meadowbrook Theatre, The Village Mall, shops and restaurants, with easy access to highways. Spend your summers grilling on the newly laid backyard patio, and relax knowing that the cooperative provides everything you need so homeownership couldn't be easier!

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

New Construction built by Moceri ! Discover a home with elegant simplicity and timeless style designed to live with an easy maintenance free lifestyle. An open concept main floor kitchen, dining and gathering space appointed with incredible interior features. The second floor features a spacious owner's suite with large walk-in closet and balcony access. The owner's bath offers a spacious shower and vanity with double sinks. Bedrooms 2 and 3 allow for the flexibility of use as bedroom or office with ample storage of walk-in closets. The second-floor laundry is conveniently located for ease of use. The finished basement rec room and full bathroom offers added living and entertainment space.

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

OPEN HOUSE SATURDAY 12-3. Incredible home on outstanding piece of property in Auburn Hills. A combination of Cape Cod, Bungalow and Farmhouse. Updated throughout but keeping the Charm of the century it was built in. Huge Master bedroom with tons of storage/closet space. New Gas F/A furnace with C/A. New roof. Wrap around porch overlooking a gorgeous back and side yard. Oversized 2 car garage with workshop area for carpenter and car enthusiast. Owners have lived here since late 80's and are moving out of state. Looking for someone who will love and care for this home as much as they have.

Discover this delightful ranch style home with a finished basement, perfectly nestled in Auburn Hills and backing up to the serene fieldstone golf course. This spacious residence features an open floor plan with three bedrooms and one and a half baths, providing ample room for comfortable living. The lower level offers a finished basement complete with an in-law suite, which has its own separate entrance for added privacy. You'll also find plenty of extra storage space and two convenient laundry setups—one on the main level and another in the basement. For those who enjoy hobbies or need extra space for projects, the oversized garage is a dream come true. It includes a dedicated works

Auburn Hills, MI home for sale

Magnificent Three-acre parcel located in the prime area of the city Auburn Hills . This spectacular homesite is in the center of Auburn Hill's Fieldstone Golf Club This private location offers a new homeowner the opportunity to build their dream home on a private wooded lot, overlooking Golf Course. The zoning can also be changed to small sub with 6-7 single family houses upon city approval. Close to shopping, restaurants, and schools. Don’t let this rare opportunity pass you by.

LOCATION , LOCATION, LOCATION!!!Move-in ready corner lot home sits on 1/4 acre cul-de-sac with fenced in yard . Updates include: Interior and exterior painting, original hardwood refinished through-out upper floor, new sewer line, half bath and kitchen in 2022. Primary bedroom has an extra room for your office/ nursery area. Clinton bike trail just outside of the subdivision, Park and Grahm elementary in the subdivision and walking distance from the same street . Grocery store and many restaurants within a mile for your convenience, not to mention easy access to highways and Oakland University. IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY. MOTIVATED SELLER. The beautiful hardwood floors extend to the spacious living room, updated full bathroom, laundry area, and a flexible main bedroom/study area. Venture upstairs to find a master bedroom with vaulted ceilings, a second bedroom with a cozy reading nook, and a generous third bedroom with a recreational room. A highlight of this property is the spacious primary bedroom featuring a luxuriously sized walk-in closet that offers ample storage for your needs. To be built within a walking distance from downtown Auburn Hills. Attractive semi-custom colonial featuring modern brick/wood cladding, 2.5 attached garage, and a large yard. Step inside to enjoy open concept living, first floor bedroom/full bath, 9' ceilings throughout, full size basement and more!! Upstairs features a large Owner's bedroom with a walk-in closet and a private en-suite bathroom with dual-sink vanity for added convenience. Enjoy peaceful living within walking distance to parks, shops and restaurants. Still time to pick your finishes!! Call agent for questions. Check docs for full plans and survey. * * Agent has equity in property * *

Spectacular BRAND NEW 1200+ sq. ft. home on a serene street in the City of Auburn Hills, Michigan. Construction is newly completed. A few blocks from downtown Auburn Hills with shops and restaurants. A quaint neighborhood with exceptional Avondale Schools within walking distance. This gracious 3 bedroom, 2 full bath home is now ready for an Investor, Tenant in place. Home also features a full basement with egress window and prepped for a full bathroom and more living space to enjoy. This beautiful home also features a gourmet kitchen to suit any chef.
